reviews.customers_say: Customers find these underwear comfortable, soft, and breathable, with a silky smooth texture that feels like a second skin. They appreciate the fit, particularly for working out, and note they don't ride up or slide down. Customers consider them good value for money and praise their quality. Regarding size, while some find them true to fit, others mention they run a little large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, durable, and functional
items.body: Good value for the money. High quality material that is breathable. Have held up for months of washing and retained color and fit. Material is nice and works well for exercising and warm weather. Colors attractive. I have come back to these multiple times due to the consistent quality. Read more
items.author: Kim C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & Cool - My New Go-To Underwear!
items.body: So, I recently snagged this 6-pack of Hanes Women's Underwear, and I've gotta say, I'm seriously impressed! If you're on the hunt for undies that are both comfy and keep you feeling fresh, you should definitely check these out. First off, the fabric is just chef's kiss. It's described as lightweight and breathable, and that is SO true. I live in a warmer climate, and these have been a total game-changer for staying cool throughout the day. No more feeling sticky and overheated, which is a huge win in my book. Plus, the moisture-wicking feature is legit. I've noticed I feel drier and more comfortable, even when things get a bit warmer than usual. It’s like having a little personal climate control down there! One of my biggest pet peeves with underwear is scratchy tags, but Hanes nailed it with these – they are completely tag-free! Seriously, this makes such a difference in everyday comfort. I don't even think about it being there, which is exactly how underwear should be, right? And let's talk about that smooth, comfortable waistband. It’s not too tight, it doesn’t dig in, and it stays put. I've worn these with everything from my everyday jeans to leggings, and the waistband has been a consistent reliable friend. No weird rolling or pinching, just pure comfort. The 100% cotton liner is a really nice touch, too. It feels soft against the skin and adds that extra layer of breathability and absorbency that I really appreciate. It just contributes to the overall feeling of a great fit. They don't ride up, they don't feel baggy, and they just kind of… disappear. You put them on and forget about them, which is the ultimate compliment for underwear! Honestly, for the price and the quality you get in this 6-pack, it’s a fantastic deal. They’ve quickly become my everyday favorites. If you're looking for underwear that prioritizes comfort, coolness, and a smooth feel, these Hanes are definitely worth giving a try. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: ʜᴀᴘᴘʏ ꜱʜᴏᴘᴘᴇʀ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and high quality, but size up for comfort
items.body: I love these panties. They're soft, high quality, and very comfortable. They've been my favorite for years! I would recommend sizing up for comfort. My hips are a tad under 36 inches and my abdomen where the waistband would be is about 32-33 inches depending on time of day. According to these measurements, the brand's sizing chart shows that I should wear a size 5. However, the size 5 panties feel very uncomfortable -- too tight, too low on my stomach and digging in too much, and too visibly small. The size 6 panties fit perfectly and the stretch isn't too tight or too loose, although after some time (months? years?) they do stretch out and become too loose. I've attached a photo, which shows that the size 5 panties are significantly smaller. Read more
items.author: customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love ❤️ these panties.
items.body: I’m strictly a “cotton” panty lady. However the fabric used in this product is soft, comfortable, fits well, is attractive, and the panties are inexpensive. An unbeatable combination. I am 5’ tall and weigh 109 lbs. The recommended size of “6” was perfect. Read more
items.author: Jeankay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try them!!
items.body: light-weight, airy fabric that's very soft and so comfortable to wear with a great fit Read more
items.author: Michele Canady Morrill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best womens underwear
items.body: These underwear are great, just as described. They are so comfortable. Ordered these back in 2022 and it took me three tries to find again. Fruit of the loom sells many types women's underwear, 350 stretch, microfiber, cotton. Although all of them are nice the previous purchase from 2022 are the best for me. I am allergic to elastic and the waist and legs are covered with fabric. . I am so happy with these, they wash and dry very well, no shrinkage . The colors are lovely and price is affordable. Will buy again , highly recommend. Read more
items.author: LAURIE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite panties
items.body: Super Comfortable and Perfect for Everyday Wear! I absolutely love these Fruit of the Loom breathable underwear! The fabric is soft, but durable lightweight and stretchy, and truly keeps me cool all day. The moisture-wicking material works great — no more feeling hot or uncomfortable. They fit perfectly and stay in place without rolling or bunching up, even after a long day. I also appreciate that they come in plus sizes and still feel flattering and supportive great quality. After washing multiple times, they still look and feel brand new. Definitely my new go-to underwear and the price is right .I’ll be buying more! Read more
items.author: T M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
items.body: Breathable, true to the size guide, a little trimming of the seams were necessary but nothing major. Stretchy but still maintain it's fit. Comfortable. Seems durable. Read more
items.author: totlyn folkes

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cotton Mesh - Brief - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Cotton Mesh - Plus Size Brief - 10 Pack - Pink/Cream/Blue, Micro Mesh - Low Rise Brief - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Hi Cut - 12 Pack - Colors May Vary, Cooling Stripes - Bikini - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Coolblend - Hi Cut - 4 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Bikini - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Plus Size Brief - 10 Pack - Black/Blue/Purple, Coolblend - Bikini - 4 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Bikini - 12 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Hi Cut - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Cooling Stripes - Brief - 6 Pack - Colors May Vary, Micro Mesh - Plus Size Brief - 10 Pack - Colors May Vary. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
